## eachStack() function

Call iteratee for every coordinate on the game board that contains tiles.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function eachStack(board: GameBoard, iteratee: StackFn): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

board


</td><td>

[GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)


</td><td>

The game board to iterate over.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

iteratee


</td><td>

[StackFn](./hive-lib.stackfn.md)


</td><td>

The function invoked per iteration.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

false if iteration ended early, true otherwise.

## Remarks

The iteratee is invoked with a hex coordinate and the stack located at that coordinate. Iteratee functions may exit iteration early by returning false.
